author: chfast
content:
I'm confused by this test case https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/blob/main/tests/cancun/eip4844_blobs/test_blob_txs.py#L420-L426.
It suggests that the data gas price will be 2, but I'm getting 1 because test env looks like
```json
    "currentDataGasUsed": "0",
    "currentExcessDataGas": "0"
```
